text: Peronia is a genus of air-breathing sea slugs, a shell-less marine pulmonate gastropod mollusks in the family Onchidiidae. Even if the name Onchis as proposed by Férussac, 1822 [April] Férussac 1822: p. xxxj, date was 13 April 1822 is older than Peronia Fleming, 1822 [June], there is no need to replace Peronia (adopted by Labbé and others) by Onchis (a name that was almost completely forgotten). The systematics of the family Onchidiidae is already quite confusing and there is no need to disrupt it further. Therefore Onchis is accepted as a synonym of Peronia.Dayrat, B. (2009) Review of the current knowledge of the systematics of Onchidiidae (Mollusca: Gastropoda: Pulmonata) with a checklist of nominal species. Zootaxa 2068: 1-26WoRMS : Onchis; accessed : 14 January 2011 Onchis was proposed by Férussac in 1822 without description or indication, so it was a nomen nudum and not made available at that occasion. ==Species== According to the World Register of Marine Species (WoRMS), the following species with valid names are included within the genus Peronia:WoRMS : Peronia; accessed : 30 September 2010 * Peronia anomala Labbé, 1934 * Peronia branchifera (Plate, 1893) * Peronia ferruginea (Lesson, 1831) * Peronia gaimardi Labbé, 1934 * Peronia gondwanae (Labbé, 1934) * Peronia indica (Labbé, 1934) * Peronia lata (Labbé, 1934) * Peronia peronii (Cuvier, 1804) * Peronia verruculata (Cuvier, 1830) ;Synonymized species : * Peronia acinosa Gould, 1852: synonym of Onchidina australis J.E. Gray in Semper, 1885 * Peronia alderi J.E. Gray, 1850: synonym of Peronia verruculata (Cuvier, 1830) * Peronia corpulenta Gould, 1852: synonym of Peronia peronii (Cuvier, 1804) * Peronia indolens Couthouy in Gould, 1852: synonym of Onchidella indolens (Couthouy in Gould, 1852) * Peronia irrorata Gould, 1852: synonym of Onchidella nigricans (Quoy & Gaimard, 1832) * Peronia laevis Quoy & Gaimard, 1825: synonym of Onchidium vaigiense Quoy & Gaimard, 1824 (uncertain) * Peronia marginata Couthouy in Gould, 1852: synonym of Onchidella marginata (Couthouy in Gould, 1852) * Peronia mauritiana Blainville, 1824: synonym of Peronia peronii (Cuvier, 1804) * Peronia parthenopeia Delle Chiaje, 1841: synonym of Onchidella celtica (Cuvier, 1817) * Peronia savignyi Recluz, 1869: synonym of Peronia verruculata (Cuvier, 1830) * Peronia semituberculata Quoy & Gaimard ex errore Blainville, 1825: synonym of Onchidium planatum Quoy & Gaimard, 1824 ==References== Category:Onchidiidae
title: Peronia
